title: Quickies at Halloween
description: Will “Halloween Hotties” be a trick or a treat for this reluctant speed dater?Charlie's co-worker begs her to attend a Halloween-themed speed dating, but when her friend is unable to attend, she goes anyway for the strong drinks and baked goods.At almost 40 and divorced, she has no interest in dating or hooking up. But she has a great costume (even if no one knows what it is), and the baked goods and drinks are REALLY good. How bad could it be?Laugh and groan along with her as she navigates the pitfalls of speed dating in this spicy romance novelette.Tropes include age gap (between 30+ adults), "done with love," and Older Woman, Younger Man, and more!Contains explicit sexual language and adult situations
author: Penny Heart
